full_summary:
## Office Furniture Category 2 - Quebec

### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: 100022589
* Reference Number: PW-22-01015977
* Amendment Number: 1
* Date of Publication: 2022-12-05
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-14 14:00:00

### Notice Type and Procurement Method

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Background and Context

This tender announcement is amended (Amendment 1) to revise the original Request for Proposal (RFP) that was issued on December 5, 2022. The procurement is set aside under the government's Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business.

The requirement is for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to various locations in Quebec. The estimated quantity of the commodity is 130, and the duration of the contract is from 2023-03-31 to 2024-04-05.

### Security Requirements

Please note that there is a security requirement associated with this tender. For additional information, refer to the bid solicitation document.

### Relevant Documents

* Amendment 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/d6c90d75358ece184be8799465de7d78/amendment_1_100022589.pdf
* RFP English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/2c58103c59bfae554b2ea812336bb107/100022589_-_rfp_en.pdf
* RFP French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/ebe3e945b4028ff62e4a44ea515559cf/100022589_-_rfp_fr.pdf

### Contact Information

* Contractor: Employment and Social Development Canada
* Contact Person: Nicole Zimmerling
